404.message: We couldn't find the page you are looking for.

FAQ.answer1: As for now, all payments are made with cash money. You can arrange directly with the driver or your passengers for the currency, in CRC (Costa Rican Colones) or in USD (US dollars)
FAQ.answer2: As for now, the platform doesn't handle refund because we do not handle payment. You can contact people directly with the in-App messaging feature.
FAQ.title: FAQ

FormDriverResponseBooking.message: {{firstName}} booked {{seatsBooked}} seats but there are {{seatsLeft}} seats left, you cannot accept or refuse this booking.
FormDriverResponseBooking.placeholder: Give your passenger more details about the booking or the ride

ManageDriverBooking.noBookings: You do not have any bookings for this ride yet

PassengersDetails.noPassengers: You do not have passengers for this ride yet

account.confirmLogOut: Are you sure you want to log out?
account.confirmRemoveAccount1: Everything will be removed and lost forever. We have no ways to recover any of your data.
account.confirmRemoveAccount2: Are you sure you want to remove your account?

becomeDriver.contactHelp: Contact us if you need help with it.
becomeDriver.disclaimer: We do not disclose any information about your country of origin. This is solely for verification purposes
becomeDriver.marchamoExplain1: You can find the year from the sticker usually on your windshield.
becomeDriver.marchamoExplain2: To assure the safety of the Tucána users on the road, we ask you for the year of insurance of your car. It also allows helps protect everyone in case of an accident during a ride. You are likely to get your application refused if your marchamo is not up-to-date.
becomeDriver.message: Build trust with your potential passengers by providing as many authentic proofs of identity.
becomeDriver.notDriver: You can apply to become a driver
becomeDriver.riteveExplain1: You can find the month and the year from the sticker usually on your windshield.
becomeDriver.riteveExplain2: To make Tucána a safe platform to use, we require all drivers to input the month and year in which a valid car inspection certificate has been issued.
becomeDriver.thankYou: Thank you for applying. A moderator will review your submission

bookings.noBookings: You haven't made a booking yet

comingSoon.subTitle: This page or feature will soon be available

confirmRide.answerNo: Can you tell us what went wrong? We would love to hear why you couldn't ride

help.message1: If anything happens during your ride, call

hiring.message: We are looking for developers, designers, content creators, managers, and much more! So if you are interested in helping make travel in Costa Rica fun, reach out to us
hiring.title: We are hiring

homepage.catchPhrase: Your companion for all your travels in Costa Rica
homepage.paragraph: Welcome to Tucána, the best carpooling app in Costa Rica: a practical and ecological way to travel and meet people.

howItWorks.bookRide2: For you and all your passengers. The payment is made in cash directly between the driver and the passengers. No commission is applied by Tucána for the moment.
howItWorks.both: With Tucána, you can do both!
howItWorks.chat: Chat with your driver or passengers
howItWorks.confirm2: To archive the trip, and in the future, allow the driver to receive the money online.
howItWorks.contactDriver: Contact the driver if you need to
howItWorks.feedback: Give us a feedback for our service
howItWorks.feedback2: To help us improve the platform
howItWorks.fillUp2: With all the relevant information about you and your car in order to keep the community safe
howItWorks.getVerified2: Your driving license and car are verified by a moderator
howItWorks.giveDetails: Detail you needs with your driver
howItWorks.giveDetails2: Example: if you transport an animal, a surfboard, or if you don't like the smell of cigarette in the car, etc
howItWorks.manageBookingsDriver: Manage the booking of your passengers
howItWorks.points2: Make sure that you know where the pickup and drop off points are. Use the in-app Google Map pin feature
howItWorks.publishRide2: Set your own price. The payment is made in cash directly between the driver and the passengers. No commission is applied by Tucána for the moment.
howItWorks.review: Submit a review for your passengers or the driver
howItWorks.review2: To continue to ensure the safety of the community
howItWorks.stepsService: Learn how simple it is to share a ride with our interactive guide
howItWorks.verifyEmail2: With your email address: check your emails (inbox and spam)

logIn.bioPlaceholder: Ex: I travel a lot to San José & I love dogs
